DDL script
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ndoutils`.`itvision_app_list` (
  `app_id` INT NOT NULL ,
  `instance_id` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL ,
  `object_id` INT(11) NOT NULL ,
  `type` ENUM('app','hst','svc') NOT NULL ,
  INDEX `fk_app_id2` (`app_id` ASC, `instance_id` ASC) ,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_app_id2`
    FOREIGN KEY (`app_id` , `instance_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`itvision_apps` (`app_id` , `instance_id` )
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1
COMMENT = 'Application list'

Application relationship
DDL script
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ndoutils`.`itvision_app_relat` (
  `app_id` INT NOT NULL ,
  `instance_id` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL ,
  `from_object_id` INT(11) NOT NULL ,
  `to_object_id` INT(11) NOT NULL ,
  `connection_type` ENUM('physical','logical') NOT NULL ,
  `app_relat_type_id` INT NOT NULL ,
  PRIMARY KEY (`from_object_id`, `to_object_id`, `app_id`, `instance_id`, `app_relat_type_id`) ,
  INDEX `fk_object_id4` (`from_object_id` ASC) ,
  INDEX `fk_object_id5` (`to_object_id` ASC) ,
  INDEX `fk_app_id3` (`app_id` ASC, `instance_id` ASC) ,
  INDEX `fk_app_relat_type_id1` (`app_relat_type_id` ASC) ,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_object_id4`
    FOREIGN KEY (`from_object_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`nagios_objects` (`object_id` )
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_object_id5`
    FOREIGN KEY (`to_object_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`nagios_objects` (`object_id` )
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_app_id3`
    FOREIGN KEY (`app_id` , `instance_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`itvision_apps` (`app_id` , `instance_id` )
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_app_relat_type_id1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`app_relat_type_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`itvision_app_relat_type` (`app_relat_type_id` )
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1
COMMENT = 'Application relationship'

Application tree
DDL script
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ndoutils`.`itvision_app_tree` (
  `app_tree_id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
  `instance_id` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL ,
  `lft` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,
  `rgt` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,
  `app_id` INT NOT NULL ,
  PRIMARY KEY (`app_tree_id`, `instance_id`, `app_id`) ,
  INDEX `fk_instance_id4` (`instance_id` ASC) ,
  INDEX `fk_app_id1` (`app_id` ASC) ,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_instance_id4`
    FOREIGN KEY (`instance_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`nagios_instances` (`instance_id` )
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_app_id1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`app_id` )
    REFERENCES `ndoutils`.`itvision_apps` (`app_id` )
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 2
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1
COMMENT = 'Application tree'

  `acknowledgement_id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,

  `conninfo_id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
  `instance_id` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,

  `agent_version` VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' ,

  `last_checkin_time` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ,
  `data_start_time` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ,
  `data_end_time` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ,
  `bytes_processed` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,

  PRIMARY KEY (`conninfo_id`) )

  `servicestatus_id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
  `instance_id` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,

  `output` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' ,
  `perfdata` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' ,
  `current_state` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,
  `has_been_checked` SMALLINT(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,
